mapper.sql: ingetid, r_uid, actid, integer, creattime, filed1, filed2
mapper.select:
select count(*) from dd_inget where
creattime like #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
actid = #{actid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
1 = 1

select dd_inget.*,raste_user.name from dd_inget left join raste_user on dd_inget.r_uid=raste_user.id where
dd_inget.creattime like #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
dd_inget.actid = #{actid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
1=1 order by dd_inget.creattime desc
limit #{num1},#{num2}
select actid from dd_activity where isdelete=1
mapper.insert: insert into dd_inget (ingetid, r_uid, actid, integer, creattime, filed1, filed2) values (#{ingetid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{r_uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{actid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{integer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed2,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into dd_inget
ingetid,
r_uid,
actid,
integer,
creattime,
filed1,
filed2,
#{ingetid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{r_uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{actid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{integer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{filed2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update dd_inget
r_uid = #{r_uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
actid = #{actid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
integer = #{integer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creattime = #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ingetid = #{ingetid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dd_inget set r_uid = #{r_uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, actid = #{actid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, integer = #{integer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creattime = #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ingetid = #{ingetid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
